name: SPEF-Solutions
overview:
We would like to give a brief intro about our company through our profile given below:

SPEF is an employee owned company, fostering a company-wide commitment to successful solution delivery. SPEF offers high-quality programs in different areas,as our name specifies Software Solutions, Print media, Entertainment, Film Making for professionals and corporates across the world.

SPEF has a reputation for innovative program designs and delivery.An excellent workforce comprising highly dedicated and excellently talented team with good experience in diverse disciplines is responsible for our reputation.

We understand that your are in need of eminent developers and data analysts for your work,which we would be easily able to provide. Efficient and experienced hands who would satisfy all your work needs.And also have the resource to expand and complete your project within the specified time period. Listed below are our major services

1, Mobile Application Developments ( iPhone and Android ). 2, Web Application Developments ( PHP, MySQL, HTML/CSS, J query and Ajax ). 3, Desktop Application Development (.NET, C++ ). 3, Flash Development AS3 ( Game, Web Site, Application, Presentation and Animations ). 4, Graphic Design ( Application GUI, Web Design, 3D Modeling & Animation, Tracing Images, Photo Editing). 5, Data Entry ( MS Office, Excel,Data conversion,HTML tagging and PowerPoint Presentation And Others ).

These all are the resources currently which we have, so that we can provide these type of developers. And works details can be shared after we make a contact with you. If you are interested in this co-operative method, then please feel free to contact us.

Website : www.spefsolutions.com Skype ID : spefsolutions
